@message: Warning: Version constraints inside provider configuration blocks are deprecated

diagnostic.summary: Version constraints inside provider configuration blocks are deprecated
diagnostic.detail: Terraform 0.13 and earlier allowed provider version constraints inside the provider configuration block, but that is now deprecated and will be removed in a future version of Terraform. To silence this warning, move the provider version constraint into the required_providers block.

@message: Error: Reference to undeclared input variable

diagnostic.detail: An input variable with the name "region" has not been declared. This variable can be declared with a variable "region" {} block.

@message: Error: Reference to undeclared input variable

diagnostic.detail: An input variable with the name "project" has not been declared. This variable can be declared with a variable "project" {} block.
